title: Academic Research on non Anime viewers in India
selftext:
Greetings everyone,

I am currently working on an academic research for which I need your help.
 
I am doing a research on Anime viewers vs Non Anime viewers on 'THE EFFECTS OF WATCHING  ANIME ON INDIAN ADULTS'. So if you're someone who doesn't watch Anime, please fill the form. (I have responses for Anime viewers, I need non Anime viewers rn)

Inclusion Criteria:
1) Indian resident above 18years of age
2) Non Anime viewers. 

Thank you for filling the form üôèüíõ
comments: There's an issue with the form, I  the questions regarding how often one way he's dramas, there is no option to select 'NIL'.
cz if you do not watch online dramas at all, this firm becomes nil
Oh, Okay. So, you want people watch shows other than anime to fill the form but not those who doesn't watch anything? Am I right?
